content: alpinia hat is constructed by first knitting a ribbed band with size 2 needles then switching to size 3 for the charted colorwork there are only 2 colors worked at a time this hat has 8 colors a main color for the ribbed band and back ground 4 leaf colors and 3 flower colors perfect for scraps if you have them due to the fact that you only need small amounts for each color i used knit picks palette in these colors cream mc 120 yds caper 25yds clover 20 yds tarragon 20 yds lichen 20 yds orange 11 yds tomato 11 yds hollyberry 11 yds
